column5: Does anyone have the name and number of a quality taxidermist who can produce a mount from a picture? We'll be in Ear Falls in a couple of weeks and want to be prepared for the big fish.Let em go - so they can grow!Bigfish

Border Bob's in Intl. Falls/Ft. Francis. They did a muskie replica for me 4 years ago and got the coloring and pattern a very close match to the picture. I'm very satisfied. Only thing, it was about a 4 month wait, but that's not unusual.

Here are a few links from the WC archives;https://www.walleyecentral.com/cgi-bi...eraldiscussionhttps://www.walleyecentral.com/cgi-bi...eraldiscussionhttps://www.walleyecentral.com/cgi-bi...eraldiscussionhttps://www.walleyecentral.com/cgi-bi...eraldiscussionTight Lines!
